title: Problem-Solving Projects in Distance Education Utilizing Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Problem-based learning (PBL) addressing real-world remote education challenges by combining 3D virtual environments (alternative platforms) with face-to-face collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can analyze dropout rate issues in real remote education environments and derive three core causes.
Learners can propose instructional design solutions based on the ADDIE or ARCS model through PBL team activities.
Learners can document simulation-based problem-solving processes in 3D virtual environments and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
